fields.title: Past
fields.meaning: This card represents the circumstances and events leading up to this moment.

fields.title: Present
fields.meaning: This card represents your current position.

fields.title: Future
fields.meaning: This card represents future if you continue on the current course.

fields.title: You
fields.meaning: This card represents your present condition, be it your feelings or your effect on the situation.

fields.title: The Relationship
fields.meaning: This card represents the state of the relationship.

fields.title: Your Partner
fields.meaning: This card represents your partner in the relationship.

fields.title: Idea
fields.meaning: The idea is the concept behind your project, and this card represents the nature or impact of that idea.

fields.title: Process
fields.meaning: This card represents the journey that you're on, or the journey you're beginning.

fields.title: Aspiration
fields.meaning: This card represents your hopes and dreams for this idea and process, or the best outcome possible.

fields.title: You
fields.meaning: Consider who you are, who you've been, and who you'd like to be.

fields.title: Path
fields.meaning: This card reflects the nature of the journey. Where are you going, and how rocky is the terrain?

fields.title: Potential
fields.meaning: This card represents the best possible outcome for the journey you're one. You might be on the right track, or it may be time to change course.
